name: Happy Singh Adventures
description: The Monsters have invaded the jungle and took many animals captive. They are destroying all the jungles one by one. The free animals have no other choice but ask for help from our hero Happy Singh.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP 处理器: Intel Core 2 Duo 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: Nvidia GT220, AMD HD5570, Intel HD4000 DirectX 版本: 9.0 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 10 处理器: Intel Core i3 2100, AMD FX 4100 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: Nvidia GTX650, AMD HD7770, Intel Iris Graphics DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
